title: Kirk Franklin & Kanye: What They Meant To Say | Daily Best of October 7 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Kirk Franklin and Kanye West are under fire for recent comments. Kirk Franklin clarifies, and Kanye West says some things that make a little more sense. Dr. Fauci appears on "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" and gets another booster, because fifth time's a charm. Mayor Lori Lightfoot is busy doing karaoke on TikTok while Chicago burns. TV Producer Adler is mistaken for someone else by a group of toddlers. And, Rick and Sherri working out together isn't really working out.

That’s why Allegiance Gold has some of the highest ratings in the industry. 5-stars with Trust Link, Triple A rated with the Business Consumer Alliance and an A+ from the Better Business Bureau. Go to https://ProtectWithRickBubba.com and get their best offer yet, up to $2,500 of free silver, on a qualifying purchase, when you tell them RICK AND BUBBA sent you. Or give them a call 844-790-9191.
